DPL

介绍

Design Patten Library——设计模式库，简称DPL。 我们为你总结了Web开发中常见模块的HTML结构，并提供一整套默认样式。

DPL 模板

如果开发了新的 DPL，请使用该模板做说明文档

<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
    <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet/less" href="demo.less" />
    <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet/less" href="../reset/reset.less" />
    <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet/less" href="../../sq-themes/default/default.less" />
    <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="../dpl-famework-src/dpl-famework.css" />
    <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="../dpl-famework-src/prettify.css" />
    <script type="text/javascript" src="../dpl-famework-src/less-1.3.3.min.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="../dpl-famework-src/prettify.js"></script>
    <title>Squirrel DPL</title>
</head>
<body onload="prettyPrint();">
<h2 class="sub-hd">Button</h2>
<div class="doc-container">

    <h3>Import</h3>
    <p>依赖 core.less、reset.less</p>
    <pre class="prettyprint">@import "../../sq-tool/sq-dpl/core/core";
@import "../../sq-tool/sq-dpl/reset/reset";
@import "../../sq-tool/sq-dpl/demo/demo";</pre>
    <h4>resource:</h4>
    <p><a href="demo.less">demo.less</a></p>
    
    <h3>Module</h3>
    <h4>Example:</h4>
    <div class="demo">

    </div>
    <pre class="prettyprint">
    
    </pre>
    
    <h3>Compatibility</h3>
    <div class="support">
        <div class="hd">
            <div>iOS 4.3<sub>+</sub></div>
            <div>Android 2.3<sub>+</sub></div>
        </div>
        <ul>
            <li><em class="A"></em></li>
            <li><em class="A"></em></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>
</body>
</html>
